title: Die Mercurii, 21. Iuly 1641, Master Glyns report: The case of the vintners, the whole profit that the King made of the project of forty shillings upon the tonne, was in three yeares, but 196 0 6.
author: Glynne, John, Sir, 1603-1666.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
